heading: Petrine office.
alt-heading: Peter,. the Apostle, Saint. Office as head of the apostles.
general-note: Here are entered works on the ministry of unity and leadership exercised by Saint Peter and that thereafter individuals or bodies exercise collegially for the whole Church after his example or as his successors. Works on the authority and jurisdiction that the Bishop of Rome in his office as successor of Saint Peter exercises over the universal Church are entered under. Popes--Primacy..
